text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/immunization-program-eligibility defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ineligible Not EligibleThe patient is not eligible for the funding program.
uninsured UninsuredThe patient is eligible for the funding program because they are uninsured.

name: ImmunizationEventProgramEligibility
title: Immunization Event Program Eligibility
description: This code system supports describing the source of the patient's eligibility for a vaccination program.

concept.definition: The patient is not eligible for the funding program.
The patient is eligible for the funding program because they are uninsured.
